extensionDescription.message: Adds a shoulder-surfing resistant graphical master password to the Firefox password manager

setupRequiredHeadline.description: Headline for the initial setup dialog.

setupRequiredStatus.message: You have not set up a graphical password yet.
setupRequiredStatus.description: Headline for the initial setup dialog.

setupRequiredExplanation.message: Once you are ready, a sequence of

setupRequiredExplanationCont.message: images will be presented to you. These images will make up your graphical password. Memorize them well!

setupRequiredStartButtonLabel.description: Label for the setup start button.

setupStepsHeadlineLeft.description: Left part of Headline for setup steps.

setupStepsHeadlineMiddle.description: Left part of Headline for setup steps.

setupStepsHeadlineRight.description: Left part of Headline for setup steps.

setupStepsPreviousButtonLabel.description: Label for the setup steps previous button.

setupStepsCancelButtonLabel.description: Label for the setup steps cancel button.

setupStepsNextButtonLabel.description: Label for the setup steps next button.

setupStepsFinishButtonLabel.description: Label for the setup steps finish button.

setupCompleteHeadline.description: Headline for the setup complete notification.

setupCompleteExplanation.message: Whenever you log in, you will be presented with
setupCompleteExplanation.description: Explanation when setup is complete, first part.

setupCompleteExplanationCont.message: random image galleries. Each gallery will contain one of the images from your graphical password. Click on each of these images to authenticate yourself.
setupCompleteExplanationCont.description: Explanation when setup is complete, second part.

setupCompleteLoginButtonLabel.description: Label for the setup complete login button.

loginForgotPasswordButtonLabel.description: Label for the forgot password button of the login dialog.

loginFailedHeadline.description: Headline for the login failed dialog.

loginFailedExplanation.message: Oh no! You got it wrong somewhere.

loginFailedLoginButtonLabel.description: Label for the login button of the login failed dialog.

loggedInHeadline.description: Headline for the logged in dialog.

loggedInExplanation.description: Explanation for logged in dialog, part 1.

loggedInExplanationCont.message: Firefox is now able to access your passwords stored in the password manager.
loggedInExplanationCont.description: Explanation for logged in dialog, part 1.

loggedInChangePasswordButtonLabel.description: Label for the change password button of the logged in dialog.

loggedInLogoutButtonLabel.description: Label for the logout button of the logged in dialog.

resetPasswordExplanation.message: Warning! All saved passwords will be lost when your graphical master password is reset!
resetPasswordExplanation.description: Explanation for the reset password dialog.

resetPasswordConfirmButtonLabel.description: Label for the confirm button of the reset password dialog, part 1.

resetPasswordConfirmButtonLabelCont.description: Label for the confirm button of the reset password dialog, part 2.

resetPasswordCancelButtonLabel.description: Label for the cancel button of the reset password dialog.

changePasswordHeadline.description: Headline for the change password dialog.

changePasswordExplanation.message: Please choose the image you would like to replace or simply have another look at your login images.
changePasswordExplanation.description: Explanation for the change password dialog.

changePasswordSubHeadlineLeft.description: Left sub headline of the change password dialog.

changePasswordSubHeadlineMiddle.description: Middle sub headline of the change password dialog.

changePasswordSubHeadlineRight.description: Right sub headline of the change password dialog.

changePasswordPreviousButtonLabel.description: Label for the change password previous button.

changePasswordNextButtonLabel.description: Label for the change password next button.

changePasswordFinishButtonLabel.description: Label for the setup change password finish button.

helpExplanationPartOne.message: This addon protects your credentials, stored in the Firefox password manager by encrypting them with a graphical master password. A graphical password consists of a number images that have to be memorized. Only the person who knows which images the password consists of is able to login.
helpExplanationPartOne.description: First part of the explanation of the help section.

helpExplanationPartTwo.message: This technique also provides some nice advantages against traditional passwords. A graphical password is much easier to remember because it makes use of the vast human capacity to store and process visual information. During each login attempt, some - but not all - of the images the password consists of have to be selected. This makes it especially hard for an adversary to steal your login credentials.
helpExplanationPartTwo.description: Second part of the explanation of the help section.

helpInstructionsSetup.message: This addon will display a number of images in the next step. We call these images the familiar information. These images will make up your password. Remember them well!

helpInstructionsLogin.message: Multiple grids of images will later be shown in the authentication phase where exactly one image per grid is part of the familiar information. You will have to point out the one image that was shown kiwi fruit (first image in the third row) would be the correct image.

helpConfirmationButtonLabel.description: Label for the confirmation button of the help section.

helpScreenshotSetupUri.description: Uri for the setup screenshot in the help section.

helpScreenshotLoginUri.description: Uri for the login screenshot in the help section.
